Class TinyTaskControllerPanel

  • Object
    • TinyTaskControllerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskListener, TaskControllerPanel, ActionListener, EventListener

    public class TinyTaskControllerPanel
extends Object
implements TaskControllerPanel, ActionListener, TaskListener
    Author:
    JeT small panel with a progress bar, the name and 3 button play, pause, stop it is linked to a task and update it's GUI dynamically
